entry.title: Saturday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40. High zero. Wind chill minus 12 this morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending after midnight then clearing. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM PST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High plus 2.
